text: The Beryozovaya () is a river in Perm Krai, Russia, a left tributary of the Kolva.Beryozovaya in encyclopedia of Perm Krai It is in length and has a drainage basin covering .«Река Березовая (Северная Рассоха)», Russian State Water Registry It starts on slopes of mountain range Beryozovy Kamen and flows through Cherdynsky District. Its mouth is downstream of the village Korepino. There are many rocks and limestone formations along its banks. Main tributaries: * Left: Zhernovka; * Right: Byrkim, Vizhay, Buzhuy, Kremennaya, Nemyd. ==References== Category:Rivers of Perm Krai
title: Beryozovaya
